data.title: Eastern & Midland Regional Assembly
data.text:
‘Regional Innovation Valley’ status given to Ireland’s 3 Regions by European Commission

All three of Ireland’s NUTS2 regions – Eastern and Midland, Southern and Northern and Western – were designated as Regional Innovation…

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Industrial-buildings-EMRegion.jpg 540 960 EMRA Editor 2 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png EMRA Editor 22024-08-06 11:47:272024-08-06 11:48:24‘Regional Innovation Valley’ status given to Ireland’s 3 Regions by European Commission

First meeting of the new Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly

The first meeting of the new Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly took place in the Council Chamber, Dún-Laoghaire Rathdown County Council on Friday…

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/5d3dc32d-7ca9-4019-ace0-56d2a6c33e7d-e1721834344131.jpeg 700 700 EMRA Editor 2 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png EMRA Editor 22024-07-12 14:14:262024-08-02 14:14:33First meeting of the new Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly

Over €32million in investment grants announced for regenerative tourism projects in Midlands

22 projects to receive €27.1million investment grant-aid in first round of investment approval*. Bord na Móna to develop up to 79 km* of trails…

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/EU-JTF-Announcemeny-Social-Asset-1_V2.png 1080 1080 EMRA Editor 1 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png EMRA Editor 12024-06-19 17:10:552024-07-11 17:12:35Over €32million in investment grants announced for regenerative tourism projects in Midlands

Deadline approaching for Fáilte Ireland funding scheme for private and community SMEs to develop regenerative tourism projects in Midlands

Private and community businesses with an idea for a tourism project are being encouraged to apply for Fáilte Ireland’s Regenerative Tourism and Placemaking…

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/grant-aid-scheme-featured.jpg 800 1200 main-admin-00045 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png main-admin-000452024-05-28 12:20:002024-06-06 13:30:09Deadline approaching for Fáilte Ireland funding scheme for private and community SMEs to develop regenerative tourism projects in Midlands

Local projects in the Midlands to receive grants amounting to €18 million under EU Just Transition Fund programme

Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications, Eamon Ryan TD, today announced the 15 projects in the Midlands that will receive grant awards…

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Midlands-EU-Projects-Featured.jpg 800 1200 main-admin-00045 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png main-admin-000452024-04-26 14:00:292024-06-06 14:36:29Local projects in the Midlands to receive grants amounting to €18 million under EU Just Transition Fund programme

“Regions in Focus” event

Councillors discuss options for enhanced Regional Government in Ireland at “Regions in Focus” event in Limerick.

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/emra-ft-regions-in-focus-generic.jpg 800 1200 main-admin-00045 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png main-admin-000452024-02-09 14:26:072024-06-06 14:17:27“Regions in Focus” event

Minister O’Donnell launches new €120m fund to renovate heritage buildings in town centres

A new funding scheme under Ireland’s two European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) Regional Programmes is providing €120m support.

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Thrive-National-Press-Release-1024x683-1.jpg 683 1024 main-admin-00045 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png main-admin-000452024-02-09 11:11:312024-02-29 17:14:11Minister O’Donnell launches new €120m fund to renovate heritage buildings in town centres

Understanding URBACT’s Impact at the Custom House

The Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly (EMRA) held its URBACT Info Day at the Custom House last Thursday, the 25th of January.

https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/URBACT_Presentation_2024_featured.jpg 800 1200 main-admin-00045 https://www.emra.ie/wp-content/themes/master/images/emra-logo-2024.png main-admin-000452024-01-31 12:09:042024-02-26 12:17:50Understanding URBACT’s Impact at the Custom House
